name: ShapeLifter
description:
TR:

"Nesnelere hükmetmek" senin süper gücün!

Süpermarkete girmen yasaklandığı için alman gereken nesneleri, onlara hükmederek marketten çıkarmalısın! Bu esnada güvenlik görevlisine dikkat etmen lazım! Güvenlik görevlisi seni tespit ederse asla hareket etme!

İyi şanslar...

Hazır kullanılan asset'ler:

  • https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/supermarket
  • https://www.mixamo.com/
  • https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-desert-eagle-b81da261345f4462b2c4412352...
  • https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/jonstrup-bar-chair-ad689a436dc241a4b2195320e801f...

EN:

Shapeshifting into objects is your super power!

You're banned from the super market so, you need to shapeshift into objects in order to extract them from the market. You need to be careful about the security guard. If he detects you stand absolutely still!

Good Luck.
